import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faArrowRight } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import useCreateProduct from './handler/createProductHandler'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; export function ProductForm() { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState(''); const [price, setPrice] = useState(''); const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [countInStock, setCountInStock] = useState(''); const [brand, setBrand] = useState(''); const [image, setImage] = useState(''); const { createProduct } = useCreateProduct(); function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); createProduct(createProduct); } return (
setName(e.target.value)}/>
setDescription(e.target.value)}/>
setPrice(e.target.value)}/>
setCategory(e.target.value)}/>
setCountInStock(e.target.value)}/>
setBrand(e.target.value)}/>
{/* Input image */}
); }
